availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Cynthia Perry Grizzell. Father of Sally Grizzell, Elizabeth Grizzell, Lencretia Grizzell, George Grizzell, Thomas Grizzell, Linnea Grizzell, Nancy Grizzell, Rebecca Grizzell, Lafayette Grizzell, Rufus H. Grizzell, Sincah Grizzell, and Mary Grizzell. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 1, p. 267. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Bruin, p. 185. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Grayson, Precinct 6, p. 19. Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), Ancestry, 1918, Carter County, file no. 12589.
